text:
Give better help in the httpd.conf file about how to enable server-status call
like the way it's given for server-info.

Instead of :
#
# Allow server status reports, with the URL of http://servername/server-status
# Change the "......" to match your domain to enable.
#

say 

#
# Allow server status reports, with the URL of http://servername/server-status
# (requires that mod_status.so be loaded)
# Change the "......." to match your domain to enable.
#
creator: virender@hotmail.com
slive@apache.org
text:
This will be fixed in the next release.

Thanks for the report.
